last_cycle.summary: Eleventh audit cycle. Audit #35 accepted by main orchestrator (cycle 82) — closed. QC validation COMPLETE: 23/23 parity, 0 E2E errors, all 5 DoD criteria satisfied. QC-ACK #122 and QC-REQUEST #299 both closed. Found 2 PHP schema classes (QAPage, Restaurant) missing from TS — coincidental 98=98 count masked the gap. Filed #37 recommending class inventory reconciliation step. Cleaned up stale cycle issues #27, #30, #33.
